channel.title: Comments on: Whacked Musings
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: You've created an awesome game! And the best art is always the kind which ensnares the like-minded and which makes the creators joyous. I don't know about anyone else, but I don't believe you shall have a full 1000 to make your fort out of:)Bastards for getting your hopes up...but enjoy the jellybeans anyway:)*hugs*
item.content:encoded: You’ve created an awesome game! And the best art is always the kind which ensnares the like-minded and which makes the creators joyous. I don’t know about anyone else, but I don’t believe you shall have a full 1000 to make your fort out of:)Bastards for getting your hopes up…but enjoy the jellybeans anyway:)*hugs*
